title: Homayra Sellier on LinkedIn: Police Charge Big Pharma Boss With Falsifying His Covid Vaccination Status... | 23 comments
author: Homayra Sellier
description: Jose Maria Fernandez Sousa-Faro, president of European pharmaceuticals giant PharmaMar, has been charged by police with being falsely vaccinated against... | 23 comments on LinkedIn
cleaned_text: Innocence in Danger. International organisation of Child Protection Jose Maria Fernandez Sousa-Faro, president of European pharmaceuticals giant PharmaMar, has been charged by police with being falsely vaccinated against Covid-19. Dr. Sousa-Faro has been caught up in a scandal in Europe involving people being added to the National Immunization Registry in exchange for large sums of money, with many of them familiar faces and household names. [#covid](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fcovid&trk=public_post-text) [#pharmaceuticals](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fpharmaceuticals&trk=public_post-text) [#people](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fpeople&trk=public_post-text) [](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnewspunch%2Ecom%2Fpolice-charge-big-pharma-boss-with-falsifying-his-covid-vaccination-status%2F&urlhash=tpZX&trk=public_post_feed-article-content) [Cheryl Parsons](https://www.linkedin.com/in/cheryl-parsons-b4228038?trk=public_post_comment_actor-name)5mo When governments force you to take a trial shot these things are going to happen. [Sage Sebastion](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sage-sebastion-113490266?trk=public_post_comment_actor-name)3mo Smart man Wonder who turned him in If he didn't want it makes you wonder. Glad I said NO [John Landry](https://ca.linkedin.com/in/johnaglandry?trk=public_post_comment_actor-name)5mo Any mainstream media covering? Google seems to have locked this down. [Lisa Novakowski](https://ca.linkedin.com/in/lisa-novakowski-363b08192?trk=public_post_comment_actor-name)5mo The scam needs to be over. Too many people have been injured or died. It is truly amazing what nefarious things people will do for money and power. [lorna hynes](https://ie.linkedin.com/in/lorna-hynes-b93747b2?trk=public_post_comment_actor-name)5mo Well well well Oops Article is from 12 month ago. Probably fake. Surprising, isn't it? For people who know the exact composition of vaccines and the possible side effects...
